title: Splendours of Italy
inclusions_evidence: 12-nights accommodation in cherry-picked hotels, all tried and trusted
Many meals and daily breakfasts included
Transport by luxury air-conditioned coach with Wi-Fi in most countries
Services of an expert Travel Director and professional Driver
Audio headsets are provided throughout your holiday to enhance your included sightseeing experiences

other.notes: Costs for meals and transport are estimated based on average prices.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive tour experience with included meals and transportation, but lacks flight inclusion and specific hotel pricing makes DIY comparison difficult.
